author: admin
title: Softmart Speaking at DEVintersection Conference
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/21/2015 @ 10:45 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Softmart 
PHILADELPHIA, Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Gina Montgomery, Vice President of Corporate Strategy for Softmart, will be one of many expert speakers at the 2015 DEVintersection conference October 26-29, 2015 at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas, Nevada. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20140616/118491 
Montgomery brings her background as a Microsoft SharePoint and Cloud evangelist coupled with her seasoned speaker experience at technology conferences all over the country to this year's DEVIntersction conference. Montgomery will help attendees discover and harness the power of SharePoint Online Search during one of her key sessions: 'Enhancing Relevancy & User Experience with SharePoint Search.' Her session will cover the latest SharePoint Search Online features that will help your end users to reach the relevant content that they are searching for while providing them an improved user experience. Montgomery is also delivering a key session; "Unleash the Power of Video Communication; Office 365 Video vs. Azure Media Services." Her session will cover the benefits of both platforms for a Video Communication solution. 
The DEVintersection is a one-of-a-kind event including six conferences under one roof. The conference is heavily geared towards the discovery and understanding of revolutionary Microsoft products such as SharePoint, Office 365, Asp.net, Visual Studio, Azure and SQL (server). Held in Vegas, America's playground, attendees are sure to enjoy themselves while learning how Microsoft products can breathe new life into their IT strategy. 
Softmart is proud to have Gina Montgomery represent the company at the DEVintersection. In addition to Montgomery, Softmart has several Microsoft and other industry experts in house. Anyone seeking expertise or a fresh perspective regarding their IT environment is encouraged to reach out to their Softmart representative today. 
About Softmart 
Softmart is a global supplier of technology solutions for business, government, education and healthcare environments. Softmart provides information technology (IT) solutions, leveraging industry-leading volume license optimization programs and all affiliated licenses support, a broad range of platforms and peripherals, supported by hardware engineer experts, specialized applications and complete end-to-end services. The company is headquartered in Downingtown, PA within the greater Philadelphia area. 
The company's business systems are ISO 9001:2008 certified.
